name: BABA vs. YOU
description:
We're team Tri-State Buffers and our theme is:

"Baba vs. You (Spin on the game Baba is you (Sorry))"

Check the in-game Rules for how to play.

Reused / 3rd party assets: 

  • Referenced Baba is You for words, Baba sprite, and in-game colors
  • Referenced Genshin Impact's hair style (hair IS original)
  • Referenced Card Captor Sakura for the magical wand (wand IS original)

Jeremy:

  • Board display
  • Connector sprites and display
  • Player/Menu input and scene switching

Alen:

  • Sentence-Checking
  • Damage calculations
  • Board generation

Joshua:

  • Assets and font creation, renders, and positioning
  • The tutorial, main menu, pause screen, and (two) end screens
  • Edited the video and made the game cover
